  • Classes in io.vertx.mutiny.ext.auth used by io.vertx.mutiny.ext.auth 
    Class Description
    AuthProvider
    User-facing interface for authenticating users.
    ChainAuth
    Chain several authentication providers as if they were one.
    HashingAlgorithm
    Hashing Algorithm.
    HashingStrategy
    Hashing Strategy manager.
    User
    Represents an authenticates User and contains operations to authorise the user.
    VertxContextPRNG
    A secure non blocking random number generator isolated to the current context.
